description: Joint spouse base questions - these determine the flow for both spouses
note: After these base questions, each spouse answers individual base questions separately, then NIN/TIN is collected for both

questions.questionText: How do you want to combine your incomes for tax purposes?
options: File separately but show combined totals
One spouse files, other spouse's income included
questions.explanation: In joint filing, you can combine both spouses' incomes together, which may result in different tax calculations. The system will help you determine the most tax-efficient approach based on your combined income and deductions.
questions.helpText: Select how you want to handle the combination of both spouses' income for tax purposes.

note_after_base: After this question, both spouses will answer individual base questions (IND_BASE_001 through IND_BASE_006) separately. Then NIN/TIN will be collected for both spouses before detailed income/deduction collection.
